meanings.definition: A letter of the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent1: In the word 'zeda', the letter 'z' comes first in the Greek alphabet.
meanings.sent2: I learned about 'zeda' while studying the Greek alphabet in school.
meanings.sent3: When playing a word game, I used 'zeda' to spell a funny word.
meanings.sent4: The letter 'z' in 'zeda' stood out like a bright star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The shape of 'zeda' is like a zigzag line on a piece of paper.

meanings.definition: A type of plant native to North America.
meanings.sent1: The 'zeda' plant has beautiful flowers that bloom in the spring.
meanings.sent2: Many birds like to build nests in the branches of the 'zeda' plant.
meanings.sent3: I saw a squirrel eating berries from the 'zeda' plant in the park.
meanings.sent4: The 'zeda' plant in the garden grew taller than all the other plants.
meanings.sent5: The leaves of the 'zeda' plant rustled in the gentle breeze.

meanings.sent1: My friend's last name is 'Zeda', which is of African origin.
meanings.sent2: The author of the book has the surname 'Zeda'.
meanings.sent3: During the family reunion, everyone teased Uncle John about his 'Zeda' surname.
meanings.sent4: The name 'Zeda' carries a sense of strength and pride.
meanings.sent5: When I heard the surname 'Zeda', it sounded like a melody in my ears.
